settings.paragraph: IPP Solutions Canada offers an exclusive portfolio of high quality products along with fast and efficient service directly in Canada.

settings.paragraph1: With this SIPP (spray in place pipelining) technology, application is easy and can be done quickly. Digital controls allow for mixing two components in different ratios.
settings.paragraph2: With the fast-set, spray applied, two component polyurea, and no reinstatements, services can be promptly restored to the property owner.

settings.paragraph: The Cyclone chain cutters are offered in 3/8", 5/16" and 1/4" and bring incredible performances and ruggedness at an unmatchable price point.

settings.paragraph1: The USB-USA nozzles, powered by their unique flow of fluids within the nozzles help you get your hard job done right and keep on working job after job, saving you valuable time and money.

settings.paragraph: The vast range of powerful pan-and-tilt cameras offered by CustomEyes Cameras are very ruggedized and allow more plumbers to take advantage of this powerful technology.

settings.paragraph1: Vetter Pipe Sealing bags are the optimum solution when quick and reliable sealing of drainage is required. A big advantage of the sealing bags are their freely selectable contact pressure(on the pipe wall): from 0.5 bar to 2.5 bar/7.25 psi to 36.25 psi.
settings.paragraph2: The areas of operation are, among others:
settings.list-tem1: Sealing off sewer pipelines during repair or maintenance work
settings.list-tem2: Avoiding sewage backflow at the source location during pipe bursts, flooding, sewer inspection, sewer cleaning, repair and maintenance work

settings.paragraph:
MwStop® can be installed in virtually any pipe, even retrospectively, in just a few minutes and provides immediate effective protection against flooding, foreign bodies and annoying odours.

The wide MwStop® range ensures that the right MwStop® model is available for every application, whether it is for backwater protection of the sewer system, for use in rainwater pipes or for preventing odour formation in mixed sewers.
